title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled

b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives)

NOTES:KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog

f. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g
SR:
MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

1. Open the preference page
2. Go to Workbench File Editors
3. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors'
4. Select an entry from 'External Editors'
5. Switch back to 'Internal Editors' (Still no selection)
6. Press OK to add the selected external editor
